subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object that defines configuration properties for the Pagination UI component.

subMembers.name: allowedPageSizes
subMembers.description: Specifies page sizes available in the page size selector.

subMembers.name: displayMode
subMembers.description: Specifies the UI component's display mode.

subMembers.name: itemCount
subMembers.description: Specifies the total number of items.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: Specifies an [aria-label] attribute for the pager.

subMembers.name: showInfo
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to show the [page information].

subMembers.name: showNavigationButtons
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to show navigation buttons.

subMembers.name: showPageSizeSelector
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to show the page size selector.

properties.name: dxPagination
properties.description: Pagination is a UI component that allows users to navigate through pages and change page size at runtime. Pagination UI includes a page navigator and several optional elements: a page size selector, navigation buttons, and page information.
